event.title: Settled near the fall line of the Ocmulgee River, Macon is the county seat of Bibb County and had a 2014

data.event: Settled near the fall line of the Ocmulgee River, Macon is the county seat of Bibb County and had a 2014 estimated population of 153,691.

Macon is also the largest city in the Macon-Warner Robins Combined Statistical Area (CSA), a larger trading area with an estimated 417,473 residents in 2014; the CSA abuts the Atlanta metropolitan area just to the north.
The two governments officially merged on January 1, 2014.
